column1: Local Foods////I've visited Local Foods just a hand full of times so far.  The sandwiches are pretty good (I'm not a huge sandwich person fyi) and nice presentation.  I've had both the crunchy chicken and duck confit sandwiches.  Both are pretty good; I like the crunchy chicken best of the two.  The atmosphere is nice.  Depending on when you visit
column2: you can expect the hipster or business crowd.  It's definitely on the pricier side for a cafe/sandwich establishment but it boosts healthy eating.
